thread.title: Bijoux but stylish room - lovely jazz music
thread.title_full: Bijoux but stylish room - lovely jazz music - Review of The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jane H
title: Bijoux but stylish room - lovely jazz music
text: Good appointed room for business or city break. Complimentary coffee and water 24x7 is great. Coffee in room would be great. V friendly reception, bell boy and shop - concierge hasn't quite got concept of customer service. Lifts took forever - but that is usual in big hotels. Good location.
